name: Snake Evolution - Tap Coins of the Mutant Tapper Clicker Game by Mr. sLItHeR
name_original: Snake Evolution - Tap Coins of the Mutant Tapper Clicker Game by Mr. sLItHeR
description:
•••••••••••New Animal: Snake ••••••••••••••
Slither evolution!!!
One day, some scientific experiments made those snakes start to mutate.
Would you like to know what mutations happening to them?
Combine snakes to evolve them and discover their most strange, fantastic and visionary forms!
You never seen so many mutations and crazy features in other games!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
INSTRUCTION
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• Put same type snakes together to mutate new creatures
• snakes poop can become coins and your money incoming
• Use snakes coins to buy new animals and new tools update
• You can also tap the snakes to make more coins
• Decorate you lovely snakes in fitting room
• Lucky draw by flip the card
• More features can let the mutations more fun
• Mysterious Alien World


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• There are more than 30 snakes for you to discover
• This game is a similar game with alpaca evolution but more fun
• Different endings and possibility: find your own snakes world to be special one than others
• Poop, get coins…. repeat and your will love it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is a simulator snakes world, think you are one snake or the god of snakes.

Disclaimer: Although this Game is free to play, some content can be purchased for real money in game. If you do not want to use these features, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.

Music: http://www.bensound.com
